mapper.select: SELECT M.MEM_NUM, M.IMG, M.ID, M.NM, M.EMAIL, M.WARNING, AT.AUTORITY_NM, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YY.MM.DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY.MM.DD') THEN TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(REG_DT,'YY.MM.DD') END AS REG_DT FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN AUTORITY AT ON M.autority_num = AT.autority_num WHERE WIT_DT IS NULL AND MEM_NUM = #{hno}
